jojo.message.action_condition.no_c_moon: You do not know the details of The Way to Heaven
jojo.message.action_condition.no_madeinh: You do not know Made in Heaven
jojo.message.action_condition.cm_heaven: You have not reached the right point yet
heaven.chat.command.lib.info:
Information on how to get "Made in Heaven":
1. To obtain C-Moon you need WhiteSnake:
- To obtain Bone:
 > Kill 36 sinners (e.g pillagers)
- Use "The 14 Phrases" action
2. You need to get Resolve 4 to obtain ability on C-Moon called "Heaven Quest":
- Use the ability at the coordinates listed in the name of the ability or in the chat
